column4: Well, the command to fix my internet speed did not work out. So I posted an new topic on ubuntu forums under networking & wireless in hope that someone out there can help me. I also have another problem
Im running ubuntu on 120gb SSD disk, I have 3 other HDD in my pc. I can only connect two of the HDD, when I connect my third HDD ubuntu wont load, stuck on the purple screen in the boot proccess.
hit  esc. or use tect mode to look at any errormessages
read what the bot is saying.. you ADD the 'text' option to the end of a line
